#############
Authors
#############

Ruben Dries. Author, maintainer.

**Jiaji George Chen**. Author.

**Natalie Del Rossi**. Author.

**Emma Kelley**. Author.

**Junxiang Xu**. Author.

**Guo-Cheng Yuan**. Author.

Citation 
=============
Dries et al. Giotto, a toolbox for integrative analysis and visualization of spatial expression data. bioRxiv (2020).
